sentence.Network_en: Unbeknown to her they had organized a surprise party.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们瞒着她筹备了一个给她意外惊喜的聚会。

sentence.Network_en: He went there unbeknown to me.
I am appalled that children can mount up debts unbeknown to their parents.
sentence.Network_cn: 让我深感震惊的是，孩子们竟会背着父母欠债累累。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U1)|无忧教育 ... unbefitting 不合适的 unbeknown 未知的 unbelief 不信.
JAN.1TH@今日话题&nbsp;by&nbsp;leemo&nbsp;1... ... 轶事 anecdote，trifle 不为人知 unbeknown 奢侈 extravagance，luxury.
通用大学英语第三册1-5单元词汇 -... ... barely adv. 仅仅，几乎不能 unbeknown adj. 未知的，不为人知的 peek through 穿过.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from un- 'not' + archaic beknown 'known'

entry.tran: 在…不知情的情况下；瞒着…
entry.def: If something happens unbeknown to you or unbeknownst to you, you do not know about it.

example.ex: I am appalled that children can mount up debts unbeknown to their parents...
example.tran: 让我深感震惊的是，孩子们竟会背着父母欠债累累。

example.ex: Unbeknownst to her father, she began taking dancing lessons.
example.tran: 她瞒着父亲开始去上舞蹈课。

means.word_mean: 1. (usually used with `to') occurring or existing without the knowledge of;

sentences.sentence: "she had been ill for months, unbeknownst to the family"
"unbeknownst to me, she made all the arrangements"

auth_sentence.content: But unbeknown to Sophie, Cal already has a son.
auth_sentence.res_content: But unbeknown to Sophie, Cal already has a son.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But unbeknown to Sophie, Cal already has a son.

auth_sentence.content: Unbeknown to me, they were already enjoying family time.
auth_sentence.res_content: Unbeknown to me, they were already enjoying family time.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unbeknown to me, they were already enjoying family time.

auth_sentence.content: Unbeknown to both men, Khyam was under MI5 and police surveillance.
auth_sentence.res_content: Unbeknown to both men, Khyam was under MI5 and police surveillance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unbeknown to both men, Khyam was under MI5 and police surveillance.
